Does anyone know if this can be updated? and if so how?
i cant fk use mods on this crap upload

@LukePamler

1) Go into the directory it was saved in. Standard is C:Users'username'Application Data.minecraft
(Application Data is normally hidden. Although I couldn't find it from hidden, so I typed it in the top.)
2) In there is a file 'Minecraft Updater.exe' open that. Should bring up Minecraft.
3) Check the box 'force update' just below your name.
Hit enter and it should update. It may state that it cannot connect to the Minecraft Server, just try again.

Hope that helped.
